      • setNavigationMode

        public void setNavigationMode(int navigationMode)
        Set the navigation mode between (thumb view or seekbar)
        Parameters:
        navigationMode, - the navigation mode must be one of the following values: 0 (NAVIGATION_THUMBS) for Thumb view mode 1 (NAVIGATION_SEEK) for seekbar mode
